alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Union; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 11 at 2:14PM EST until March 12 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 6 PM EST SATURDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 26 possible. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Georgia and northeast and northern Florida. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 7 AM to 6 PM EST Saturday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Saturday night through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Appropriate action should be taken to ensure tender vegetation and outdoor pets have adequate protection from the cold temperatures. Young children, the elderly and the homeless are especially vulnerable to the cold. Take measures to protect them.
